pages.text: Etched adds new ways to play and create music in Minecraft. Use the Etching Table to make custom records with labels, colors, and songs from supported URLs. The Album Jukebox plays up to 9 discs in order or on repeat, while the Jukebox Minecart lets you play music on the rails. You can also insert records into jukeboxes with hoppers. A new Bard villager offers musical trades, and Blank Music Discs can be obtained by smelting records or trading.
